ERROR_DISCONNECTED_FROM_SERVER: サーバーから切断されました。

ERROR_SESSION_EXPIRED: セッションが期限切れになりました。

ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION: このクライアントではサーバーがサポートされていません。
GAMES_DRAW_CARD_FIRST_TURN: 先行プレイヤーがカードを引く

GAMES_PLAY_SUPPORTER_FIRST_TURN: 最初のターンでサポーターを使用できるようにする
LOGIN_CHANGE_SERVER: サーバーアドレスを変更する

PROFILE_CHANGE_EMAIL_SUCCESS: Eメールアドレスが正常に変更されました。

PROMPT_INVITE_NO_DECK: You must prepare a valid deck before accepting the invitation.
REGISTER_EMAIL_HINT: You will be able to use this e-mail to recover your password.
REGISTER_EMAIL_TAKEN: This e-mail is already in use
REGISTER_NAME_HINT: Other players will see this unique name at your games. At least 3 alphanumeric characters.
REGISTER_NAME_TAKEN: This name is already in use.
REGISTER_NOTE: This program is free software. It comes without any warranty, to the extent permitted by applicable law.
REGISTER_PASSWORD_HINT: Must contain at least 5 characters and no spaces.
REGISTER_SUCCESS: Player account successfully created. Now you can use your credentials to sign in.
RESET_PASSWORD_CANNOT_SEND_EMAIL: We could not send an e-mail to the provided address.
RESET_PASSWORD_EMAIL_HINT: Please specify your account e-mail address.
RESET_PASSWORD_EMAIL_NOT_EXISTS: The e-mail address does not exist in our database.
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: We have sent an e-mail to your account address with the instructions of how to change your password.
SET_PASSWORD_INVALID_TOKEN: Token for password change is invalid or has expired.
SET_PASSWORD_NEW_HINT: Must be at least 5 characters including at least one numeric character.
VALIDATION_CANNOT_CONNECT_TO_SERVER: Could not connect to this server.
VALIDATION_INVALID_ADDRESS: This is not a valid address.
VALIDATION_INVALID_DECK_FILE: The deck file could not be decoded.
VALIDATION_INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT: This is not a valid e-mail address.
VALIDATION_INVALID_IMAGE: The selected image is not supported.
VALIDATION_INVALID_NAME_FORMAT: This is not a valid name.
VALIDATION_INVALID_NUMBER: This is not a valid number.
VALIDATION_INVALID_PASSWORD_FORMAT: This is not a valid password.
VALIDATION_INVALID_REPLAY: The replay file could not be decoded.
VALIDATION_NAME_ALREADY_IN_USE: This name is already in use.

GAME_MESSAGES.ATTACH_ENERGY_CARDS: Attach energy cards to the Pokémon.

GAME_MESSAGES.CANNOT_USE_STADIUM: You can't use this stadium card right now.

GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARDS_ORDER: Order cards in any way you like.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARDS_TO_PUT_ON_TOP_OF_THE_DECK: Choose cards to place on top of the deck.

GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_BASIC_POKEMON_TO_BENCH: Choose a Basic Pokémon to place on your bench.

GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARD_TO_COPY_EFFECT: Choose card, that you want to play.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARD_TO_DECK: Choose cards, that will be shuffled into deck.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARD_TO_DISCARD: Choose cards, that will be discarded.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARD_TO_HAND: Choose cards, that you will take into your hand.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_ONE_ITEM_AND_ONE_TOOL_TO_HAND: Choose one item and one Pokémon tool to put in your hand.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_CARD_TO_PUT_ONTO_BENCH: Choose Pokémon, that will be put onto your Bench.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_ENERGIES_TO_DISCARD: Choose energies, that will be discarded.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_ENERGIES_TO_HAND: Choose energies, that will be returned to your opponent's hand.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_NEW_ACTIVE_POKEMON: You have no Active Pokémon. Choose the new one.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_POKEMON_TO_DISCARD: Choose Pokémon that will be discarded.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_POKEMON_TO_PICK_UP: Choose Pokémon that will be pick up to hand.
GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_POKEMON_TO_SWITCH: Choose Pokémon to switch with the Active Pokémon.
GAME_MESSAGES.ENERGY_ALREADY_ATTACHED: An energy card was already attached this turn.
GAME_MESSAGES.FLIP_ASLEEP: Flip the coin for the Asleep.
GAME_MESSAGES.FLIP_BURNED: Flip the coin for the Burned.
GAME_MESSAGES.FLIP_CONFUSION: Flip the coin for the Confusion.
GAME_MESSAGES.INVALID_TARGET: You can't play this card here.
GAME_MESSAGES.INVITATION_MESSAGE: Player has invited you to a match. Choose your deck to accept the invitation.
GAME_MESSAGES.LEEK_SLAP_CANNOT_BE_USED_AGAIN: Leek Slap can't be used again.
GAME_MESSAGES.MAX_PLAYERS_REACHED: The match already has the maximum number of players.
GAME_MESSAGES.MOVE_ENERGY_TO_ACTIVE: Move energy cards to the Active Pokémon.
GAME_MESSAGES.MOVE_ENERGY_TO_BENCH: Move energy cards to the Benched Pokémon.
GAME_MESSAGES.POKEMON_TOOL_ALREADY_ATTACHED: Pokémon already has a tool card.
GAME_MESSAGES.SAME_STADIUM_ALREADY_IN_PLAY: Stadium card with the same name already in play.

GAME_MESSAGES.SETUP_WHO_BEGINS_FLIP: Flip the coin to decide who goes first.
GAME_MESSAGES.STADIUM_ALREADY_PLAYED: Stadium card was already played this turn.
GAME_MESSAGES.STADIUM_ALREADY_USED: Stadium effect was already used this turn.
GAME_MESSAGES.SUPPORTER_ALREADY_PLAYED: Supporter was already played this turn.

GAME_MESSAGES.WANT_TO_DRAW_CARDS: Do you want to draw cards from your deck?

GAME_MESSAGES.WANT_TO_PLAY_BOTH_CARDS_AT_ONCE: Do you want to play both cards at once?
GAME_MESSAGES.WANT_TO_SHUFFLE_POKEMON_INTO_DECK: Do you want to shuffle the Pokémon into the deck?
GAME_MESSAGES.WANT_TO_SWITCH_POKEMON: Do you want to switch Pokémon?
GAME_MESSAGES.WANT_TO_USE_ABILITY: Do you want to use Ability?
GAME_MESSAGES.CALAMITY_STORM: Do you want to discard the Stadium in play?
GAME_MESSAGES.GO_FIRST: Would you like to go first?
GAME_MESSAGES.INCREASE_DAMAGE_BY_30_AGAINST_OPPONENTS_: Increase damage by 30 against your opponent's ex and V Pokémon.
GAME_MESSAGES.DISCARD_STADIUM_OR_TOOL: Choose a Stadium card or Tool card to discard
GAME_MESSAGES.WANT_TO_DRAW_UNTIL_6: Do you want to draw until you have 6 cards in your hand?

GAME_LOGS.LOG_BANNED_BY_ARBITER: {{name}} made an invalid move multiple times and was banned by the arbiter.'
GAME_LOGS.LOG_GAME_FINISHED_BEFORE_STARTED: Game finished before it has started.

GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_NO_PRIZE_CARD: {{name}} has no more Prize cards left.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_RETURNS_TO_DECK_FROM_DISCARD: {{name}} returns {{card}} from their Discard Pile into their Deck.

GAME_LOGS.LOG_STARTS_BECAUSE_OF_ABILITY: {{name}} starts the game because of {{ability}} ability.
